ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c &&
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Bind Order Sent"), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Delivered to Insured") ), ISCHANGED(Stage__c), OR( Endorsement_Quote_Uploaded__c = FALSE, Payment_Received__c = FALSE ),
ISPICKVAL(Billing__c , "Agency") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Error: Need Endorsement Quote Uploaded and Payment Received before moving to Bind Order Sent
